import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Layout, Typography, Row, Col, Menu, Dropdown, Space, Avatar } from 'antd' import { DownOutlined, UserOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import styled from 'styled-components' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { loadUserRequestAction, logoutRequestAction } from '../../reducers/user' import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' const { Header } = Layout const { Title } = Typography function Navbar() { const navigate = useNavigate() const { me } = useSelector((state) => state.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() const onLogOut = () => { console.log('logout') dispatch(logoutRequestAction({ navigate })) } const menu = ( <>
